com.robotgame.gameengine.Robot.Nodes

Class NodeSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robotgame.gameengine.Robot.Nodes.NodeSystem

  • public class NodeSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for handling systems of nodes that can be continually updated. After updating, the resulting actions of the nodes can be retrieved as the return object of Update().
    See Also:
    Node, NodeConnection, Robot, RobotFactory, NodeFactory

    • Method Detail

      • Update

        public java.util.LinkedList<NodeAction> Update(MatchContext context)
        Updates the entire node system.
        Parameters:
        context - should contain updated information about robots and environmental factors.
        Returns:
        a list of NodeAction objects to execute.

      • GetOutputOfNode

        private boolean GetOutputOfNode(int nodeIndex)
        Recursive function to update and evaluate nodes. By using recursion this function traverses the entire node graph if needed to acquire the inputs needed for a node to update.
        Parameters:
        nodeIndex - the index of the node to query
        Returns:
        the output of the specified node

      • GetHotConnections

        public boolean[] GetHotConnections()
        Gets a list of the status of all node connections. Not usable yet.
        Returns:
        an array of boolean values.
